Text: Thanks for the up of Gravity, been waiting all year for this. Could you upload The Story if you have it. It was released earlier this year or late last year. It have a bunch of different artists Lecrae has a song on there!

Sicanddisturbed, The Story?  So it's a Various Artist compilation then?  Are you talking about "Music Inspired By The Story?" The 6th track on Disc #1 is called "Bring Us Home" and features Lecrae. If so, it has already been included in one of my previous 2012 bundles.  Have a look, it's in there somewhere. :)
Hey TorrentsTracts just showing some love, really enjoyed The Old Paths album in bundle 34, also 737 had a reely good one to. Have you found any Iv His Son, Jovan Mackenzy or Marcus Cole? be bless

Thanks soggal! I've only listened to The Old Paths once.  I'll have to play it again soon.  And as for the other artists, I've been keeping an eye open since you last mentioned it.  Nothing so far.  I'm particularly interested in checking out IV His Son.  :)

If anyone has any Christian music requests they'd like to sample, drop 'em on me.  Of course I torrent all the 2012 stuff as I get it.  But if I can throw together a quick discography or you, it'd be my pleasure.  Just let me know.
ill upload the music inspired by the story it a reall great album
TT, you are awesome - thanks so much for your diligent work on getting this powerful music to us all. Stay blessed my friend!!
